{"id":308371015,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 10 months","timestamp":1583092196,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/308371015/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"N/A","code":"int64_t pow(int x, int y){\n    int64_t res = 1;\n    for (int i = 1; i <= y; i++)\n    {\n        res *= x;\n    }\n    return res;\n}\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n int myAtoi(std::string str) {\n        size_t index = 0;\n        size_t len = str.length();\n        int sign = 0;\n        while(str[index] == ' ' && index++ < len){}\n        if(index >= str.length()) return 0;\n        if(str[index] == '-'){\n            sign = -1;\n            index++;\n        }else if(str[index] == '+'){\n            sign = 1;\n            index++;\n        }else if(isdigit(str[index])){\n            sign = 1;\n        }else return 0;\n        if(index >= str.length()) return 0;\n        size_t i = index;\n        int digits = 0;\n        int64_t res = 0;\n        while (isdigit(str[i++])){ digits++; }\n        while (isdigit(str[index]))\n        {\n            res += pow(10, --digits) * (str[index] - '0');\n            index++;\n        }\n        res *= sign;\n        if (res < -INT32_MAX) return -INT32_MAX-1;\n        else if (res > INT32_MAX) return INT32_MAX;\n        return res;\n                \n}\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
